# IPoolManager
[Git Source](https://gitlab.com/nomadhub/smart-contracts/blob/9a5d5791960776da326b790b7c18e7af6b05a3aa/contracts/v2/external/@pancakeswap/infinity-periphery/src/interfaces/IPoolManager.sol)

**Title:**
IPoolManager

Interface for the PoolManager contract


## Functions
### vault

Returns the vault contract


```solidity
function vault() external view returns (IVault);
```
**Returns**

|Name|Type|Description|
|----|----|-----------|
|`<none>`|`IVault`|IVault The address of the vault|
